    • Method Detail

      • send

        public static void send(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String subtitle,
                        int fade_in,
                        int stay,
                        int fade_out)
        Sends a title and a subtitle message to the player. If either of these values are null, they will not be sent and the display will remain unchanged. If they are empty strings, the display will be updated as such. If the strings contain a new line, only the first line will be sent. All timings values may take a value of -1 to indicate that they will use the last value sent (or the defaults if no title has been displayed).

        Parameters:
        player - Target player.
        title - Title text
        subtitle - Subtitle text
        fade_in - Time in ticks for titles to fade in. Defaults to 10.
        stay - Time in ticks for titles to stay. Defaults to 70.
        fade_out - Time in ticks for titles to fade out. Defaults to 20.

      • send

        public static void send(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String subtitle)
        Sends a title and a subtitle message to the player. If either of these values are null, they will not be sent and the display will remain unchanged. If they are empty strings, the display will be updated as such. If the strings contain a new line, only the first line will be sent. All timings values may take a value of -1 to indicate that they will use the last value sent (or the defaults if no title has been displayed).

        Parameters:
        player - Target player.
        title - Title text
        subtitle - Subtitle text

      • reset

        @Deprecated
public static void reset(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Deprecated. It seems it is not working anymore.
        Resets the title displayed to the player. This will clear the displayed title/subtitle and reset timings to their default values.

        Parameters:
        player - Target player.

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String subtitle,
                             int fade_in,
                             int stay,
                             int fade_out)
        Sends a title and subtitle to all the players online.

        Parameters:
        title - Title text
        subtitle - Subtitle text
        fade_in - Time in ticks for titles to fade in. Defaults to 10.
        stay - Time in ticks for titles to stay. Defaults to 70.
        fade_out - Time in ticks for titles to fade out. Defaults to 20.
        See Also:
        send(Player, String, String, int, int, int)
